DOC.brief_title: Treatment Symptomatic BPH Patients Undergoing Anticoagulant Therapy Using PlasmaButton Vaporization Electrode

Anticoagulant regiment include : Aspirin 81mg , Aspirin 325mg , Adenosine diphosphate ( ADP ) receptor inhibitor , Cilostazol , Dabigatran , Dipyridamole , Warfarin .
